attributes.action: Ban Standing Passengers on Trains Travelling at Speeds in Excess of 80 m.p.h.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the event of a high speed train crash then the risk of passengers  being killed or seriously injured is greater when there are standing passengers.

In the event of an emergency, the time taken to evacuate passengers is greater when there are standing passengers.
